SELECT D.RECEIVER_NAME, D.RECEIVER_PHONE, D.ADDRESS_NAME, D.ADDRESS_OTHER, O.TOTAL_PRICE, O.ORDER_DATE, O.ORDER_IMPNO FROM ORDER_TB O JOIN DELIVERY_ADDRESS D ON D.MEMBER_ID = O.MEMBER_ID WHERE O.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND O.RECEIVER_NAME = D.RECEIVER_NAME ORDER BY O.ORDER_IMPNO DESC
SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT PD.PRODUCT_NAME, PD.PRODUCT_PRICE, P.PRODUCT_COUNT, PD.PRODUCT_CHANGE FROM PAYMENT P JOIN PRODUCT PD ON P.PRODUCT_NO = PD.PRODUCT_NO WHERE P.ORDER_IMPNO = #{orderImpNo}
